name: Twitch clean chat
description:
Updated for the Theatre mode! (17th of December 2014)
Now works and looks appealing with the dark style used by theatre mode.
Also some misc clean up of old css.

Updated for the new chat layout! (5th of March 2014)

Names are can no longer be coloured according to their badges, so the badges are now coloured rectangles with varying widths.
additional_info: <s>You can edit the style to force nickname colours to individuals too, using the commented out template line.</s> (This feature is not available with the new chat layout)

discussions.name: New chat replay broke my fav Twitch CSS
